post.author: Sae Whan Kim
post.content:
Hello Ladies/Gents;

First of all, my apology for not writing in Korean...

Thank you for visiting this GeSiPan.
I would like to take this opportunity to introduce myself to you.

My name is Steven Kim, and as a member of Web Maintenance/Operation
team, I am assigned to this Gesipan to take a good care of it.

Not having had much experience in this sort of responsibility,
I am a bit afraid and ,at the same time, excited about what we are
going to do with it.

Yes, I will try to make the Gesipan rolling strong and
a useful vehicle to have lots of members enjoying the ride.

In another words, I will try to do my best to keep this Gesipan
useful and ,in consequence, it will contribute positively to members who are in job market or not directly or indirectly.

The main goal of this Gesipan is to share information on jobs and anything related.

For example, you could post a job information if your company has
an opening, or your job search experience, etc.

Anyone is welcomed to post any job related information, any if there is any questions asked, of course, I or other members will try to
answer it.

Would you not join me to make this Gesipan a successful one ?

I hope to meet a lot of people thru this Gesipan in future.

Thanks.

SK
post.title: Hello...
